SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Battle
Represents a battle between the player and an enemy in a room.
BattleActivity
Activity representing the battle between the player and an enemy.
BattleIntents
Class containing constants for intent extras used in the BattleActivity.
ConfigurationActivity
Activity for configuring the game settings before starting the dungeon exploration.
Difficulty
Enum representing the different difficulty levels in the game.
Dungeon
Class representing a dungeon in the game.
DungeonActivity
Activity representing the dungeon exploration in the game.
DungeonIntents
Class containing constants for intent extras used in the DungeonActivity.
Enemy
Class representing an enemy in the game.
Entity
Abstract class representing a generic entity in the game.
Game
Represents the game state and logic.
Item
Class representing an item in the game.
ItemType
Enum representing the different types of items in the game.
Player
Class representing a player in the game.
Room
Class representing a room in the dungeon.
RoomViewModel
ViewModel class for managing the state of a Room.
Score
Represents a score entry in the game.
ScoresActivity
Activity for displaying the list of scores.
ScoresAdapter
Adapter class for displaying scores in a RecyclerView.
